definition: sorrowful through loss or deprivation, a person who has suffered the death of someone they loved
details:
adjective
- sorrowful through loss or deprivation
= synonyms: bereft, grief-stricken, grieving, mourning, sorrowing
noun
- a person who has suffered the death of someone they loved
= example: a person who has suffered the death of someone they loved
= synonyms: bereaved person
